title: Future Of Offshore Wind Farm In Massachusetts Uncertain
teaser: Massachusetts bet big on wind energy, sinking $113 million into a waterfront terminal designed to serve the new industry off the New England coast. But now the biggest wind project planned for the area, Cape Wind, is all but dead, and the prospective industry faces an uncertain future.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
